summary.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that help debug your code.

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that help debug your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用中的方法类来打印调试信息并检查与断言逻辑，您可以使代码更稳健而不会影响你发货的产品的性能和代码大小。If you use methods in the class to print debugging information and check your logic with assertions, you can make your code more robust without impacting the performance and code size of your shipping product. 此类提供方法以显示对话框中，并发出将始终失败的断言。This class provides methods to display an dialog box, and to emit an assertion that will always fail. 此类提供了以下各种变体的写入方法： ， ，和。This class provides write methods in the following variations: , , and . 和类提供动态控制跟踪输出方法。The and classes provide means to dynamically control the tracing output. 无需重新编译你的应用程序，可以修改这些开关的值。You can modify the values of these switches without recompiling your application. 有关使用配置文件设置开关的信息，请参阅类和[跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)主题。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see the class and the [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md) topic. 可以通过添加自定义跟踪输出的目标到实例或删除实例从集合。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding instances to or removing instances from the collection. 集合共享的同时和类; 添加到其中一个类跟踪侦听器将侦听器添加到同时。The collection is shared by both the and the classes; adding a trace listener to either class adds the listener to both. 默认情况下，类会发出跟踪输出。By default, the class emits trace output. > [!NOTE] > 添加到跟踪侦听器集合可能导致跟踪，时引发异常，如果跟踪侦听器使用的资源不可用。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 条件和引发的异常取决于跟踪侦听器，并不能在本主题中枚举。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 可能会很有用，将调用中的方法`try` / `catch`块以检测和处理跟踪侦听器中的任何异常。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. 您可以修改的使用缩进级别方法或属性。You can modify the level of indentation using the method or the property. 若要修改的缩进间距，使用属性。To modify the indent spacing, use the property. 您可以指定是否自动在每次写入后刷新输出缓冲区，通过设置属性设置为`true`。You can specify whether to automatically flush the output buffer after each write by setting the property to `true`. 若要设置并为，可以编辑与应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To set the and for , you can edit the configuration file corresponding to the name of your application. 配置文件应进行格式化，如下面的示例中所示。The configuration file should be formatted as shown in the following example. ```xml ``` 特性应用于的方法。The attribute is applied to the methods of . 支持的编译器忽略对这些方法的调用，除非将"DEBUG"被定义为条件编译符号。Compilers that support ignore calls to these methods unless "DEBUG" is defined as a conditional compilation symbol. 请参阅编译器的文档以确定是否支持以及用于定义条件编译符号的语法。Refer to a compiler's documentation to determine whether is supported and the syntax for defining a conditional compilation symbol. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio C# 和 Visual Basic 项目中，默认情况下，"DEBUG"条件编译符号定义对于调试版本，并为同时调试和发布版本定义"TRACE"符号。In Visual Studio C# and Visual Basic projects, by default, the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol is defined for debug builds, and the "TRACE" symbol is defined for both debug and release builds. 有关如何禁用此行为的信息，请参阅 Visual Studio 文档。For information about how to disable this behavior, see the Visual Studio documentation. 有关在 Visual c + + 中的条件性调试的信息，请参阅[Debug 类 (C + + CLI)](/cpp/dotnet/debug-class-cpp-cli)。For information about conditional debugging in Visual C++, see [Debug Class (C++/CLI)](/cpp/dotnet/debug-class-cpp-cli). 若要在 C# 中定义的"DEBUG"条件编译符号，将添加`/d:DEBUG`时使用命令行，将代码编译到编译器命令行选项或添加`#define DEBUG`到你的文件的顶部。To define the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` option to the compiler command line when you compile your code using a command line, or add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:DEBUG=True`到编译器命令行选项，或添加`#Const DEBUG=True`的文件。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` option to the compiler command line or add `#Const DEBUG=True` to the file. ## Examples 下面的示例使用指示开始和结束对程序的执行。The following example uses to indicate the beginning and end of a program's execution. 此示例还使用和来区分将跟踪输出。The example also uses and to distinguish the tracing output. [!code-cpp[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，方法仅适用于调试版本。By default, the method works only in debug builds. 使用方法如果你想要执行断言版本中的生成。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管代码中的断言](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). > [!IMPORTANT] > `Assert`方法不可用于[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]应用。The `Assert` methods are not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps. 通常情况下，方法用于标识程序开发过程的逻辑错误。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 评估的条件。 evaluates the condition. 如果结果为`false`，它将发送到失败消息集合。If the result is `false`, it sends a failure message to the collection. 可以通过添加自定义此行为，或从中移除集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 应用程序在运行时用户界面模式，它会显示一个消息框，显示调用堆栈与文件和行号。When the application runs in user interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 消息框包含三个按钮：**中止**，**重试**，并**忽略**。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 单击**中止**按钮将终止该应用程序。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 单击**重试**向你发送到调试器中的代码，如果你的应用程序在调试器中运行或产品/服务如果不是打开调试程序。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 单击**忽略**将继续执行下一个指令在代码中。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用程序不支持模式对话框，因此它们的行为在用户界面模式和非用户界面模式中相同。 apps do not support modal dialog boxes, so they behave the same in user interface mode and non-user interface mode. 调试模式中的活动的跟踪侦听器写入消息，或在发布模式下写入任何消息。The message is written to the active trace listeners in debugging mode, or no message is written in release mode. > [!NOTE] > 消息框显示取决于是否存在。The display of the message box depends on the presence of the . 如果不在集合，该消息框不会显示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以通过移除[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，则[<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或通过调用方法属性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 您可以更改的行为对应于你的应用程序的名称在配置文件中。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，你可以启用和禁用断言消息框或设置属性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 应按如下所示设置格式的配置文件：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个数组的索引、 执行某些操作来设置索引的值，然后调用用于确认的索引值是否有效。The following example creates an index for an array, performs some action to set the value of the index, and then calls to confirm that the index value is valid. 如果不是有效的调用堆栈输出。If it is not valid, outputs the call stack. [!code-cpp[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用的.NET Framework，才能将对象的值转换为其文本表示形式，在字符串中嵌入该表示形式。This method uses the of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 生成的字符串发送到集合。The resulting string is sent to the collection. 默认情况下，方法仅适用于调试版本。By default, the method works only in debug builds. 使用方法如果你想要执行断言版本中的生成。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管代码中的断言](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed 如果结果为`false`，则调用方法并`detailMessageFormat`字符串和`args`数组作为参数传递。If the result is `false`, The method is called and the `detailMessageFormat` string and `args` array are passed in as parameters. 然后，将发送指定的文本消息和到带格式的文本消息集合。 then sends the specified text message and the formatted text message to the collection. 可以通过添加自定义此行为，或从中移除集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 应用程序在运行时用户界面模式，它会显示一个消息框，显示调用堆栈与文件和行号。When the application runs in user interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 消息框包含三个按钮：**中止**，**重试**，并**忽略**。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 单击**中止**按钮将终止该应用程序。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 单击**重试**向你发送到调试器中的代码，如果你的应用程序在调试器中运行或产品/服务如果不是打开调试程序。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 单击**忽略**将继续执行下一个指令在代码中。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > 消息框的显示是依赖于是否存在。The display of the message box is dependent on the presence of the . 如果不在集合，该消息框不会显示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以通过移除[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，则[<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或通过调用方法属性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 您可以更改的行为对应于你的应用程序的名称在配置文件中。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，你可以启用和禁用断言消息框或设置属性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 应按如下所示设置格式的配置文件：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 除非显式调用，刷新该流不会刷新其基础编码器或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 设置到`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但编码器状态不会进行刷新。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8，UTF7 其中某些字符仅后才能进行编码的编码器收到的相邻字符。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. 若要设置并为，还可以编辑与应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To set the and for , you can also edit the configuration file corresponding to the name of your application. 配置文件应进行格式化，如下面的示例中所示。The configuration file should be formatted as shown in the following example. ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，输出将写入到的实例。By default, the output is written to an instance of . 此方法调用方法的跟踪侦听器。This method calls the method of the trace listener. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为`generalSwitch`。The following example creates a named `generalSwitch`. 此开关设置之外的代码示例。This switch is set outside of the code sample. 如果此开关设置为`Error`或更高版本，该示例将输出到第一条错误信息。If the switch is set to the `Error` or higher, the example outputs the first error message to the . 有关信息添加到侦听器集合，请参阅类。For information on adding a listener to the collection, see the class. 然后，如果设置为`Verbose`，该示例将输出第一条消息的同一行上的第二个错误消息。Then, if the is set to `Verbose`, the example outputs the second error message on the same line as the first message. 行终止符遵循第二条消息。A line terminator follows the second message. span.para: 可以通过使用装备您的应用程序的性能损失降到最低语句而不是使用语句。以下两个代码示例发送相同的调试消息。但是，第一个示例是要快得多时跟踪处于关闭状态，因为如果mySwitch.TraceError的计算结果为，不要调用。第二个示例始终调用，即使mySwitch.TraceError是和不生成任何跟踪输出。这可能导致不必要地执行任意复杂的代码。第一个示例: '' c# if(mySwitch.TraceError) Debug.Write ("aNumber ="+ 一个数字 +"超出范围");'' 第二个示例: '' csharp Debug.WriteIf (mySwitch.TraceError，"aNumber ="+ 一个数字 +"超出范围");\`\`\`

You can minimize the performance penalty of instrumenting your application by using statements instead of using statements. The following two code examples send the same debugging message. However, the first example is much faster when tracing is off, because if mySwitch.TraceError evaluates to , you do not call . The second example always calls , even when mySwitch.TraceError is and no tracing output is produced. This can result in unnecessary execution of arbitrarily complex code. First example: ```csharp if(mySwitch.TraceError) Debug.Write("aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ``` Second example: ```csharp Debug.WriteIf(mySwitch.TraceError, "aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```

span.para: 可以通过使用装备您的应用程序的性能损失降到最低语句而不是使用语句。以下两个代码示例发送相同的调试消息。但是，第一个示例是要快得多时跟踪处于关闭状态，因为如果mySwitch.TraceError的计算结果为，不要调用。第二个示例始终调用，即使mySwitch.TraceError是和不生成任何跟踪输出。这可能导致不必要地执行任意复杂的代码。第一个示例: '' c# if(mySwitch.TraceError) Debug.WriteLine ("aNumber ="+ 一个数字 +"超出范围");'' 第二个示例: '' csharp Debug.WriteLineIf (mySwitch.TraceError，"aNumber ="+ 一个数字 +"超出范围");\`\`\`

You can minimize the performance penalty of instrumenting your application by using statements instead of using statements. The following two code examples send the same debugging message. However, the first example is much faster when tracing is off, because if mySwitch.TraceError evaluates to , you do not call . The second example always calls , even when mySwitch.TraceError is and no tracing output is produced. This can result in unnecessary execution of arbitrarily complex code. First example: ```csharp if(mySwitch.TraceError) Debug.WriteLine("aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ``` Second example: ```csharp Debug.WriteLineIf(mySwitch.TraceError, "aNumber = " + aNumber + " out of range"); ```
